thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: ANA(ss)

author: news24.com
title: ANA(ss)
text:
Nothing Mr.Haas has said is untrue! However, he misses the point of ANAs completely (or maybe from the union's point of view, perfectly!).
We need to know what the present level of learning, our children have, is compared to what they should (ideally) have.
We need a benchmark to understand where we need to intervene so as to not create another level of "unemployables".
Don't blame it on the DA, blame it on the unions and the ANC.
